text: The Blazing Sun (, ) is a 1954 Egyptian romantic drama movie directed by Youssef Chahine and starring Omar Sharif (in his movie debut), Faten Hamama, Zaki Rostom, Farid Shawqi. ==Other websites== * Category:1954 romantic drama movies Category:Egyptian movies Category:Movies directed by Youssef Chahine
title: The Blazing Sun (1954 movie)
